Text: eHong KongWelcome to the June issue of eHong Kong the electronic newsletter of the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in San Francisco This issue includes some background on the new Chief Secretary for Administration and the Financial Secretary who just came on board as well as Brand Hong Kong a major new program to focus international attention on Hong Kongs drive to be Asias world city There is coverage of the Fortune Global Forum held in May and much more We have also provided links to the most recent economic data from Hong Kong and updated forecasts as well Please click on the URL below to see the newsletter ehongkongehongkonghtm Thank you for reading eHong Kong Jean Ip Principal Information Officer Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office San Francisco Tel Fax
